section.p:
is an engineering firm located near the Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport in Minnesota. We provide unusual talent and skills to take on projects other firms have turned down. Founded by engineers in 1991, we are able to relate to engineers.
You will not talk to sales people at Eagan Technical Services. You will only talk to engineers who understand your technical needs and can give you a 'yes' or 'no' answer on your projects quickly - allowing you to focus on other aspects of your project.
Give Eagan Technical Services a try; we succeed where others have failed.

We are excited to announce the arrival of our new PVD machine. Medical, industrial and custom jobs--whether they are small, medium or large volume--are no problem. We have the experience and ability to work through any design problem or situation. Custom built to our specifications we can coat any of your critical parts with any of the standard coatings (TiN, CrN, AlTiN) along with any custom material you need. We have sputtering capability also.

Eagan Technical Services, Inc. has been proudly serving the Mendota Heights, Minnesota area for 20 years. We have built our customer base through hard work and determination, something that has allowed us to become the company we are today. We take great pride in providing you with top-level service and promise complete satisfaction when choosing us for all of your industrial material needs.

Eagan Technical Services, Inc. provides business, industry and government with electronic software and mechanical contract engineering. Our size gives us flexibility, ensuring a quick turn-around for the custom project. From assistance in initial design and prototyping to complete assembly, we work with you to deliver a quality product.

We are excited to announce our silicone and rubber molding capabilities. Medical, industrial and custom jobs--whether they are small, medium or large volume--are no problem. We have the experience and ability to work through any design problem or situation. We insert mold or custom blend materials and colors. We offer low cost tooling for small volume jobs, or can tool for multiple cavities and lower the cost of parts. Silicone molding is a specialized fieldâ-and we have the experience to make your idea a success. Eagan Technical Services, Inc., succeeding where others fail.

Eagan Technical Services, Inc. provides assembly, electronics and mechanical for Mendota Heights, Minnesota and the surrounding areas. Contact us today for more information. We always enjoy hearing from our customers, whether they are returning or new and we look forward to earning your business and trust.
